reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 133/18: COLLECTION AND ANALYSIS OF INFORMATION

content.content: 1. The following administrative entities are prescribed for the purposes of section 11.5 of the Act: 1.  The Electrical Safety Authority. 2.  The Ontario Motor Vehicle Industry Council. 3.  The Retirement Homes Regulatory Authority. 4.  The Technical Standards and Safety Authority. O. Reg. 443/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following administrative entities are prescribed for the purposes of section 11.5 of the Act:

1.  The Electrical Safety Authority.

2.  The Ontario Motor Vehicle Industry Council.

3.  The Retirement Homes Regulatory Authority.

4.  The Technical Standards and Safety Authority. O. Reg. 443/20, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
